sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Johnson & Johnson ( JNJ ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.2%.
Year to date, Johnson & Johnson registers a 22.7% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 1.8%.
Home Depot is showing a gain of 34.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading down 1.1%, and Microsoft Corporation ( MSFT ), trading up 0.9% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
